00039 class TextWriter
00040 {
00041     public:
00042 
00043     TextWriter(std::ostream& os, int depth = 0)
00044     :   os_(os), depth_(depth), indent_(depth*2, ' ')
00045     {}
00046 
00047     TextWriter child() {return TextWriter(os_, depth_+1);}
00048 
00049     TextWriter& operator()(const std::string& text)
00050     {
00051         os_ << indent_ << text << std::endl;
00052         return *this;
00053     }
00054 
00055     TextWriter& operator()(const CVParam& cvParam)
00056     {
00057         os_ << indent_ << "cvParam: " << cvinfo(cvParam.cvid).name;
00058         if (!cvParam.value.empty())
00059             os_ << ", " << cvParam.value;
00060         os_ << std::endl; 
00061         return *this;    
00062     }
00063 
00064     TextWriter& operator()(const UserParam& userParam)
00065     {
00066         os_ << indent_ << "userParam: " << userParam.name;
00067         if (!userParam.value.empty()) os_ << ", " << userParam.value; 
00068         if (!userParam.type.empty()) os_ << ", " << userParam.type; 
00069         os_ << std::endl; 
00070         return *this;    
00071     }
00072 
00073     template<typename object_type>
00074     TextWriter& operator()(const std::string& label, const std::vector<object_type>& v)
00075     {
00076         (*this)(label);
00077         for_each(v.begin(), v.end(), child());
00078         return *this;
00079     }
00080 
00081     TextWriter& operator()(const MSData& msd)
00082     {
00083         (*this)("msdata:");
00084         child()
00085             ("id: " + msd.id);
00086         if (!msd.accession.empty())
00087             child()("accession: " + msd.accession);
00088         if (!msd.version.empty())
00089             child()("version: " + msd.version);
00090         if (!msd.cvs.empty())
00091             child()("cvList: ", msd.cvs);
00092         if (!msd.fileDescription.empty())
00093             child()(msd.fileDescription);
00094         if (!msd.paramGroupPtrs.empty())
00095             child()("paramGroupList: ", msd.paramGroupPtrs);
00096         if (!msd.samplePtrs.empty())
00097             child()("sampleList: " , msd.samplePtrs);
00098         if (!msd.instrumentPtrs.empty())
00099             child()("instrumentList: ", msd.instrumentPtrs);
00100         if (!msd.softwarePtrs.empty())
00101             child()("softwareList: ", msd.softwarePtrs);
00102         if (!msd.dataProcessingPtrs.empty())
00103             child()("dataProcessingList: ", msd.dataProcessingPtrs);
00104         if (!msd.run.empty())
00105             child()(msd.run);
00106         return *this;
00107     }
00108     
00109     TextWriter& operator()(const CV& cv)
00110     {
00111         (*this)("cv:");
00112         child()
00113             ("cvLabel: " + cv.cvLabel)
00114             ("fullName: " + cv.fullName)
00115             ("version: " + cv.version)
00116             ("URI: " + cv.URI);
00117         return *this;
00118     }

00120     TextWriter& operator()(const FileDescription& fd)
00121     {
00122         (*this)("fileDescription:");
00123         child()
00124             (fd.fileContent)
00125             ("sourceFileList: ", fd.sourceFilePtrs);
00126         for_each(fd.contacts.begin(), fd.contacts.end(), child()); 
00127         return *this;
00128     }

00130     TextWriter& operator()(const ParamContainer& paramContainer)
00131     {
00132         for (std::vector<ParamGroupPtr>::const_iterator it=paramContainer.paramGroupPtrs.begin();
00133              it!=paramContainer.paramGroupPtrs.end(); ++it)
00134              (*this)("paramGroupRef: " + (*it)->id);
00135         for_each(paramContainer.cvParams.begin(), paramContainer.cvParams.end(), *this);
00136         for_each(paramContainer.userParams.begin(), paramContainer.userParams.end(), *this);
00137         return *this;
00138     }
00139 
00140     TextWriter& operator()(const FileContent& fileContent)
00141     {
00142         (*this)("fileContent:");
00143         child()(static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(fileContent));
00144         return *this;
00145     }

00147     TextWriter& operator()(const SourceFile& sf)
00148     {
00149         (*this)("sourceFile:");
00150         child()
00151             ("id: " + sf.id) 
00152             ("name: " + sf.name) 
00153             ("location: " + sf.location)
00154             (static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(sf));
00155         return *this;
00156     }

00158     TextWriter& operator()(const SourceFilePtr& p)
00159     {
00160         if (!p.get()) return *this;
00161         return (*this)(*p);
00162     }

00186     TextWriter& operator()(const SamplePtr& p)
00187     {
00188         if (!p.get()) return *this;
00189         (*this)("sample:");
00190         child()
00191             ("id: " + p->id)
00192             ("name: " + p->name)

00197     TextWriter& operator()(const Instrument& instrument)
00198     {
00199         (*this)("instrument:");
00200         child()
00201             ("id: " + instrument.id)
00202             (static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(instrument));
00203         if (!instrument.componentList.empty())
00204             child()(instrument.componentList);
00205         if (instrument.softwarePtr.get() && !instrument.softwarePtr->empty())
00206             child()("instrumentSoftwareRef: " + instrument.softwarePtr->id);
00207         return *this;    
00208     }
00209 
00210     TextWriter& operator()(const InstrumentPtr& p)
00211     {
00212         return p.get() ? (*this)(*p) : *this;
00213     }

00215     TextWriter& operator()(const ComponentList& componentList)
00216     {
00217         (*this)("componentList:");
00218         if (!componentList.source.empty())
00219             child()(componentList.source);
00220         if (!componentList.analyzer.empty())
00221             child()(componentList.analyzer);
00222         if (!componentList.detector.empty())
00223             child()(componentList.detector);
00224         return *this;
00225     }

00230         child()
00231             ("order: " + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(component.order))

00266     TextWriter& operator()(const DataProcessing& dp)
00267     {
00268         (*this)("dataProcessing:");
00269         child()
00270             ("id: " + dp.id);
00271         if (dp.softwarePtr.get() && !dp.softwarePtr->empty())
00272             child()("softwareRef: " + dp.softwarePtr->id);
00273         for_each(dp.processingMethods.begin(), dp.processingMethods.end(), child());
00274         return *this;
00275     }

00278     {
00279         return p.get() ? (*this)(*p) : *this;
00280     }

00282     TextWriter& operator()(const ProcessingMethod& processingMethod)
00283     {
00284         (*this)("processingMethod:");
00285         child()
00286             ("order: " + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(processingMethod.order))
00287             (static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(processingMethod));
00288         return *this;
00289     }
00290 
00291     TextWriter& operator()(const Run& run)
00292     {
00293         (*this)("run:");
00294         child()("id: " + run.id);
00295         if (run.instrumentPtr.get())
00296             child()("instrumentRef: " + run.instrumentPtr->id);
00297         if (run.samplePtr.get())
00298             child()("sampleRef: " + run.samplePtr->id);
00299         if (!run.startTimeStamp.empty())
00300             child()("startTimeStamp: " + run.startTimeStamp);
00301         child()(static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(run));
00302         if (!run.sourceFilePtrs.empty())
00303         {
00304             child()("sourceFileRefList: ");
00305             for (std::vector<SourceFilePtr>::const_iterator it=run.sourceFilePtrs.begin();
00306                  it!=run.sourceFilePtrs.end(); ++it)
00307                  child().child()("sourceFileRef: " + (*it)->id);
00308         }
00309         if (run.spectrumListPtr.get())
00310             child()(run.spectrumListPtr);
00311         if (run.chromatogramListPtr.get())
00312             child()(run.chromatogramListPtr);
00313         return *this;
00314     }
00315 
00316     TextWriter& operator()(const SpectrumList& spectrumList)
00317     {
00318         (*this)("spectrumList:");
00319         for (size_t index=0; index<spectrumList.size(); ++index)
00320             child()
00321                 (*spectrumList.spectrum(index, true)); 
00322         return *this;
00323     }

00327         return p.get() ? (*this)(*p) : *this;

00344     TextWriter& operator()(const Spectrum& spectrum)
00345     {
00346         (*this)("spectrum:");
00347         child()
00348             ("index: " + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(spectrum.index))
00349             ("id: " + spectrum.id)
00350             ("nativeID: " + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(spectrum.nativeID))
00351             ("defaultArrayLength: " + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(spectrum.defaultArrayLength))
00352             (spectrum.dataProcessingPtr)
00353             (static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(spectrum));
00354         if (!spectrum.spectrumDescription.empty())
00355             child()(spectrum.spectrumDescription);
00356         for_each(spectrum.binaryDataArrayPtrs.begin(), spectrum.binaryDataArrayPtrs.end(), child()); 
00357         return *this;
00358     }

00368             (chromatogram.dataProcessingPtr)
00369             (static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(chromatogram));

00374     TextWriter& operator()(const SpectrumDescription& spectrumDescription)
00375     {
00376         (*this)("spectrumDescription:");
00377         child()(static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(spectrumDescription));
00378 
00379         if (!spectrumDescription.acquisitionList.empty())
00380             child()(spectrumDescription.acquisitionList);
00381 
00382         if (!spectrumDescription.precursors.empty())
00383             child()("precursorList: ", spectrumDescription.precursors);
00384 
00385         if (!spectrumDescription.scan.empty())
00386             child()(spectrumDescription.scan);
00387 
00388         return *this;
00389     }

00391     TextWriter& operator()(const Scan& scan)
00392     {
00393         (*this)("scan:");
00394         if (scan.instrumentPtr.get()) child()(*scan.instrumentPtr);
00395         child()(static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(scan));
00396         if (!scan.selectionWindows.empty())
00397             child()("selectionWindowList: ", scan.selectionWindows);
00398         return *this;
00399     }

00405         return *this;

00408     TextWriter& operator()(const BinaryDataArrayPtr& p)
00409     {
00410         if (!p.get() || p->empty()) return *this;
00411         
00412         std::stringstream oss;
00413         oss << "[" << boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(p->data.size()) << "] ";
00414         oss.precision(12);
00415         for (unsigned int i=0; i<3 && i<p->data.size(); i++)
00416             oss << p->data[i] << " ";
00417         oss << "...";
00418 
00419         (*this)("binaryDataArray:");
00420         child() (static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(*p));
00421         if (p->dataProcessingPtr.get() && !p->dataProcessingPtr->empty())
00422             child()(p->dataProcessingPtr);
00423         if (!p->data.empty())
00424             child()("binary: " + oss.str());
00425         return *this;
00426     }
00427 
00428     TextWriter& operator()(const Precursor& precursor)
00429     {
00430         (*this)("precursor:");
00431         child()
00432             ("spectrumRef: " + precursor.spectrumID)
00433             (static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(precursor));
00434 
00435         if (!precursor.ionSelection.empty())
00436         { 
00437             child()("ionSelection:");
00438             child().child()(precursor.ionSelection);
00439         }
00440 
00441         if (!precursor.activation.empty())
00442         {
00443             child()("activation:");
00444             child().child()(precursor.activation);
00445         }
00446 
00447         return *this;
00448     }

00450     TextWriter& operator()(const Acquisition& acquisition)
00451     {
00452         (*this)("acquisition:");
00453         child()
00454             ("number: " + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(acquisition.number));
00455         if (acquisition.sourceFilePtr.get())
00456             child()("sourceFileRef: " + acquisition.sourceFilePtr->id);
00457         if (!acquisition.spectrumID.empty())
00458             child()("spectrumRef: " + acquisition.spectrumID);
00459         child()
00460             (static_cast<const ParamContainer&>(acquisition));
00461         return *this;
00462     }
